text: The Curtain Pole is a 1909 American silent comedy movie directed by D. W. GriffithThe Curtain PoleDavid Kalat. Too Funny for Words and stars Mack Sennett, Harry Solter, and Florence Lawrence. ==Actors== * Mack Sennett as Monsieur Dupont * Harry Solter as Mr. Edwards * Florence Lawrence as Mrs. Edwards ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 movies Category:1900s comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Curtain Pole
